derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: Latin, literally mask, character played by an actor'

entry.def: Someone's persona is the aspect of their character or nature that they present to other people, perhaps in contrast to their real character or nature.

example.ex: ...the contradictions between her private life and the public persona...
example.tran: 她私生活和公众形象间的冲突

example.ex: From time to time he will take on a new persona.

means.word_mean: 1. an actor's portrayal of someone in a play;
2. (Jungian psychology) a personal facade that one presents to the world;
